title: Aziz Ansari
description:
On an all new episode of Comedy Gold Minds, Kevin is joined by comedian, actor, writer, and director Aziz Ansari. The two have a detailed conversation about their rise to success in stand-up, how the show Master of None came about, where Aziz draws his inspiration from for his material, and Aziz’s experience in taking a step back from performing and work for time to himself.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Aziz Ansari, Kevin Hart)
